content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or preferences. However, there are several reputable tour companies and guides that offer Kruger National Park safaris. You can search online for reviews and recommendations or check with the park or the South African Tourism Board for a list of accredited and licensed operators. It is important to choose a guide or a company that follows responsible tourism practices and prioritizes the safety, comfort, and well-being of both their clients and the animals in the park.
